price: “You were heedless of this; now We have removed your veil[14], so your vision is sharp Today.”
arabic: لَّقَدۡ كُنتَ فِي غَفۡلَةٖ مِّنۡ هَٰذَا فَكَشَفۡنَا عَنكَ غِطَآءَكَ فَبَصَرُكَ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ حَدِيدٞ
footnotes: [14] Of heedlessness by seeing the punishment and hardships.
